availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand. Tennessee native. Son of Zephaniah Orange and Elizabeth Orange. Married to Martha E. Blalock Orange in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 15, 1863. Father of G. W. Orange. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 357B-358A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 42-3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 416B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546374, p. 3.
"Zephaniah Jordan Orange (1830-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial #153435139, accessed June 10, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/153435139.
